src:
Slavko Perović do prečke, asistencija Ćosića!
Univerzitatea lako savladala Dinamo - 4:1

04 Nov 2019

Biće Univerzitatea kandidat za titulu u Rumuniji. Tim za koji igra nekadašnji štoper Crvene zvezde Uroš Ćosić lakše nego što se očekivalo je savladao Dinamo iz Bukurešta (4:1), i stigao na tri boda od lidera Kluža.
Jednu od najboljih utakmica u sezoni odigrali su momci nekadašnjeg selektora Rumunije Viktora Piturke. Brzi i konkretni su bili domaći, odbrana Dinama nije imala rešenje za mladog reprezentativca Rumunije Andreji Ivana.
Prvi gol postigao je bugarski internacionalac Ivanov, a onda je nastupio već pomenuti Ivana. Napadač Univerzitatee imao je odgovarajućeg saradnika u Urošu Ćosiću. Srpski štoper mu je asistirao u 45. minutu za treći gol domaćeg tima. Jasno je bilo da je Univetzitatea rešila pitanje pobednika posle provg poluvremena.
Istina, Dinamo nije bio bezopasan. Sreće nije imao Slavko Perović. Pri rezultatu 2:0 odlično je rođeni Kragujevčanin osetio prostor i gde će završiti lopta posle ubacivanja iz kornera. Šutirao je glavom i pogodio prečku.
Tračak nade za goste pojavio se u 56. minutu. Tada je udarcem levom nogom pogodio Nistor. Međutim, nisu igrači Dinama imali snage za preokret.

RUMUNIJA 1 - 15. kolo

PetakVitorul - Kindija 3:0 (2:0)/Ganea 7, Bobok 27, Munteanu 90+3/
SubotaGaz Metan - Hermanštat 1:1 (0:0)/Fernadeš 67 - Dumitriu 61/
Kluž - Klinčeni 3:0 (0:0)/Kulio 52. penal, Traore 68, Deak 71/
NedeljaVoluntari - Botošani 1:2 (1:0)/George 12 - Miron 66, Čindris 87/FCSB - Sepsi 2:1 (0:1)/Gnohare 56, Tanase 60 - Karanović 27/
PonedeljakAstra Đurđu - Politehnika 4:0 (1:0)/Budesku 27 i 81, George 76 i 86/Univerzitatea - Dinamo 4:1 (3:0)/Ivanov 20, Ivan 31 i 45+3, Mihaila 86 - Nistor 57/


*kvote su podložne promenama
text:
Slavko Perovic to the crossbar, assisted by Cosic!
Universitatea easily beat Dinamo - 4: 1

04 Nov 2019

There will be a Universitatea contender for the title in Romania. The team played by former Red Star stopper Uros Cosic was easier than expected to beat Dinamo from Bucharest (4: 1), scoring three points behind leader Cluj.
One of the best games of the season was played by former Romanian coach Viktor Piturka. Quick and concrete were domestic, Dinamo's defense had no solution for Romania's young national team Andrei Ivan.
The first goal was scored by the Bulgarian international Ivanov, and then the already mentioned Ivan appeared. The Universitatea attacker had a corresponding associate in Uros Cosic. The Serbian stopper assisted him in the 45th minute for the third goal of the home team. It was clear that Univetzitatea had solved the question of the winner after provg halftime.
True, Dinamo was not harmless. Slavko Perovic had no luck. With a score of 2: 0, the great born Kragujevac player felt the space and where the ball would end up after the corner kick. He shook his head and hit the crossbar.
A glimmer of hope for the guests emerged in the 56th minute. Then Nistor hit with his left foot. However, no Dinamo players had the strength to turn it around.

ROMANIA Round 1 - Round 15

FridayVitorul - Kindia 3: 0 (2: 0) / Ghana 7, Bobok 27, Munteanu 90 + 3 /
SaturdayGaz Metan - Hermanstatt 1: 1 (0: 0) / Fernades 67 - Dumitriu 61 /
Cluj - Klinceni 3: 0 (0: 0) / Culio 52nd Penalty, Traore 68, Deak 71 /
SundayVoluntari - Botosani 1: 2 (1: 0) / George 12 - Miron 66, Chindris 87 / FCSB - Sepsi 2: 1 (0: 1) / Gnohare 56, Tanase 60 - Karanovic 27 /
MondayAstra Giurgiu - Polytechnic 4: 0 (1: 0) / Budescu 27 and 81, George 76 and 86 / Universitatea - Dynamo 4: 1 (3: 0) / Ivanov 20, Ivan 31 and 45 + 3, Michael 86 - Nistor 57 /


* quotas are subject to change
